column4: i've got a ubuntu based laptop system running lxde (its the only thing that seems to run acceptably on that box) 128 mb ram, PIII coppermine 733 mhz- i seem to have a spike in processor usage whenever i start up a new terminal window.. any leads on where i cn start troubleshooting it?
a new term starts up a new shell.. and reads various configs, and executes a lot of little commands.. sounds normal to me.
every time you start an app i would imagine you see a bit  of a spike.
